devdoc.details: banq audit is a decentralized audit platform for opensource (smart contract) audit projects     anyone can submit audit request and anyone can submit a audit report. A successful agree results in     increased loyalty points. A disagree results in loss of loyalty points.

ClaimResponse(uint256,bool).details: Auditor can check response from aditee and agree with changes to receive rewards     or disagree. Disagree will deduct reliability point from the auditee.

CloseReport(uint256).details: Auditor can close a report before reaction of the auditor.

RequestAudit(bytes32,string,uint256[4]).details: auditee can request an audit using this function and sets reward per bug and bug risk.     contract needs a deposit of multiples of the total reward.

SubmitReport(bytes32,bytes32,string,uint.details: auditor can submit a report (bug) for a pending audit.

VerifyReport(uint256,uint256[10],uint256.details: Auditee can check an audit report and agree/adjust the bug risk in the report      or claim that the report is not received. If not receiven it will deduct      reliability points of the auditor.

changeDev(address).details: function for the developer to change the address.

depositAudit(bytes32).details: auditee can deposit additional funds to a pending audit.

getAuditData(bytes32).details: functions to get the arrays of the audit and report structs.
